twoSetSkill.name: Flower Dance 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When the host is on the field, gain 1 Dance Level for every 5s on the battlefield (Max Dance Level: 3). The 3 Dance Levels buff Total DMG Multiplier by 15%, 20%, and 25% respectively. The Dance Level is reset to 0 when the host exits the field.

threeSetSkill.name: Dance of Passion 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When the Dance Level reaches 3, attacks will cause an explosion, dealing 300% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies. CD: 6s.
